statesNoSmartManagementBody.defaultMessage: Manage your infrastructure directly from console.redhat.com by controlling the scope of package and advisory updates to be installed on selected systems based on criteria you define, providing you with consistent content across environments and time from the console. {br} {br} Creating content templates from console.redhat.com is a premium feature only available with Red Hat Smart Management.
